text: 26.23: Ais 42.6; 49.6; Ru 24.26; 24.44-47; 1 Ko 15.20; Kor 1.18Mbe khaŋ suaŋgi, ‘Fhe Bakɨme won gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav farasarigi guma, ana fharav zaa ndigip, rimgip, ana vhɨra fharav taagi mbogar kegɨp khavgirga guma ma. Ana khavgip, ana Fhe Bakɨme taagip Isreriŋ gum mba harigi ŋgui gumgi gu mbigi ndirga buni bun mbe suanga. Ana mba buni bun mbe suanga, mba buni vhava ŋaara farar muuŋgip tuavar mbe khɨvɨrga.’ ”
